snippet: In her Broadway debut, in “Stick Fly,” Condola Rashad is demonstrating gifts that go far beyond her experience or her famous name.
abstract: Actress Condola Rashad makes her Broadway debut and demonstrates great talent in the play Stick Fly.
lead_paragraph: In her Broadway debut, in “Stick Fly,” Condola Rashad is demonstrating gifts that go far beyond her experience or her famous name.

headline.seo: Condola Rashad Shows Star Qualities in ‘Stick Fly’
headline.main: A Newcomer Is Showing Her Comfort Among Stars
headline.print_headline: A Newcomer Is Showing Her Comfort Among Stars
